publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-580 Mr Mark Ruskell: European Network of GMO-Free Regions-That the Parliament applauds the 10 European regions of Aquitaine, the Basque Country, Limousin, Marche, Salzburg, Schleswig-Holstein, Thrace-Rodopi, Tuscany, Upper Austria and Wales whose agriculture ministers have signed a document asserting the right of regions to forbid genetically modified organisms (GMOs) within their territories, in order to establish a 'network of GMO-free regions'.

S2M-580 European Network of GMO-Free Regions (lodged on 10 November 2003) Mark Ballard*, Eleanor Scott*, Patrick Harvie*, Shiona Baird*, Robin Harper*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Frances Curran*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-580 European Network of GMO-Free Regions (lodged on 10 November 2003) Carolyn Leckie*, Jim Mather*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-580 European Network of GMO-Free Regions (lodged on 10 November 2003) Dr Jean Turner*, Rob Gibson*

S2M-580 Mr Mark Ruskell: European Network of GMO-Free Regions-That the Parliament applauds the 10 European regions of Aquitaine, the Basque Country, Limousin, Marche, Salzburg, Schleswig-Holstein, Thrace-Rodopi, Tuscany, Upper Austria and Wales whose agriculture ministers have signed a document asserting the right of regions to forbid genetically modified organisms (GMOs) within their territories, in order to establish a 'network of GMO-free regions'. Supported by: Mark Ballard, Eleanor Scott, Patrick Harvie, Shiona Baird, Robin Harper, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Frances Curran, Rosie Kane, Carolyn Leckie, Jim Mather, Chris Ballance, Dr Jean Turner, Rob Gibson
S2M-580 European Network of GMO-Free Regions (lodged on 10 November 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-580 European Network of GMO-Free Regions (lodged on 10 November 2003) Tommy Sheridan*
